What we do online impacts our physical and mental state in real life.
Each digital image, video, and audio of us online reflects a piece of who we are as a person.
Our digital self is a tangible online extension of the human being we are in the physical world.

Post: Image

This post should display a large image at the top of a page.

image: /images/so-simple-sample-image-3.jpg

Tall images will push content down the page. 1600 x 600 is a good middle-ground size to aim for.
